item.title: Annie add a quote by Barbara Kingsolver
item.description: "The very least you can do in your life is figure out what you hope for. And the most you can do is live inside that hope. Not admire it from a distance but live right in it, under its roof." -- Barbara Kingsolver

item.title: Annie add a quote by Barbara Kingsolver
item.description: "The friend who holds your hand and says the wrong thing is made of dearer stuff than the one who stays away." -- Barbara Kingsolver

item.title: Annie add a quote by Barbara Kingsolver
item.description: "Don’t try to make life a mathematics problem with yourself in the center and everything coming out equal. When you’re good, bad things can still happen. And if you’re bad, you can still be lucky." -- Barbara Kingsolver

item.title: Annie add a quote by Graham Parke
item.description:
"Just before I look under my bed, I always get a little cold feeling, as if part of me expects to find something staring back at me.
I've probably seen too many Hollywood movies to have any hopes of ever cultivating a healthy relationship with the underside of my bed." -- Graham Parke

item.title: Annie add a quote by Graham Parke
item.description: "Instead of heading for a big mental breakdown, I decided to have a small breakdown every Tuesday evening." -- Graham Parke

item.title: Annie add a quote by Barack Obama
item.description: "We may not be able to stop evil in the world, but how we treat one another is entirely up to us." -- Barack Obama

item.title: Annie add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Annie add a quote by S.R. Ranganathan
item.description: "Every reader his or her book. Every book its reader." -- S.R. Ranganathan
